onboarding.study_body:
Learn how to use inhalers from the doctors!

Make sure you know the correct usage of inhalers!
onboarding.reminder_body: To remember the correct time and day to take your medicine!

learn: Let's learn how to use Inhalers!
video:
Learn how to use inhalers properly
from this video!
add_reminder:
Add reminders so you
remember to take medicine!
label_input_validator:
Label must be less
than 9 letters!
notification: It's time to take your medicine!
name_input_validator:
Username must be less
than 12 characters!
name: Name
